00015 void Main_menu::Render()
00016 {
00017         ALLEGRO_COLOR green = al_map_rgba_f(0, 0.5, 0, 1);
00018         ALLEGRO_COLOR bright = al_map_rgba_f(0.25, 0.75, 0.25, 1);
00019         ALLEGRO_FONT* font = game->Get_font();
00020         int fh = 20;
00021         int n = 3, y, cx;
00022         
00023         y = al_get_display_height()/2 - (fh * n) /2;
00024         
00025         cx = al_get_display_width()/2;
00026         
00027         if(font)
00028         {
00029                 al_set_blender(ALLEGRO_ALPHA, ALLEGRO_INVERSE_ALPHA, (option==0) ? bright : green );
00030                 al_font_textout_centre(font, cx, y, "Play Game", -1);
00031                 al_set_blender(ALLEGRO_ALPHA, ALLEGRO_INVERSE_ALPHA, (option==1) ? bright : green );
00032                 al_font_textout_centre(font, cx, y+fh, "Options", -1);
00033                 al_set_blender(ALLEGRO_ALPHA, ALLEGRO_INVERSE_ALPHA, (option==2) ? bright : green );
00034                 al_font_textout_centre(font, cx, y+fh*2, "Exit",-1);
00035 
00036                 al_set_blender(ALLEGRO_ALPHA, ALLEGRO_INVERSE_ALPHA, bright );
00037                 al_font_textout_centre(font, cx - 120, y+fh*option, "▶⚔", -1);
00038                 al_font_textout_centre(font, cx + 120, y+fh*option, "⚔◀", -1);
00039 /*              al_font_textout(font, "Some unicode symbols:", 50, 240);
00040                 al_font_textout(font, "■□▢▣▤▥▦▧▨▩▪▫▬▭▮▯▰▱", 50, 260);
00041                 al_font_textout(font, "▲△▴▵▷▸▹►▻▼▽▾▿◀◁◂◃◄◅◆◇◈◉◊", 50, 280);
00042                 al_font_textout(font, "○◌◍◎●◐◑◒◓◔◕◖◗◘◙", 50, 300);
00043 */      }
00044         al_set_blender(ALLEGRO_ALPHA, ALLEGRO_INVERSE_ALPHA, al_map_rgba_f(1, 1, 1, 1));
00045 }

00047 
00048 game_event_n Main_menu::Event(ALLEGRO_EVENT event)
00049 {
00050         game_event_n ret = GAME_EVENT_NONE;
00051 
00052         if (event.type == ALLEGRO_EVENT_KEY_DOWN)
00053         {
00054 
00055                 switch (event.keyboard.keycode)
00056                 {
00057                 case ALLEGRO_KEY_UP:
00058                         --option;
00059                         if (option<0) option=2;
00060                         break;
00061                 case ALLEGRO_KEY_DOWN:
00062                         ++option;
00063                         if (option==3) option=0;
00064                         break;
00065                 case ALLEGRO_KEY_SPACE:
00066                 case ALLEGRO_KEY_ENTER:
00067                         Monday_out(VERBOSE_LEVEL2, std::cout, "Main Menu - press option=%d\n", option);
00068                         switch (option)
00069                         {
00070                                 case 0: ret = GAME_EVENT_PLAY_GAME; break;
00071                                 case 1: ret = GAME_EVENT_OPTIONS_MENU; break;
00072                                 case 2: ret = GAME_EVENT_EXIT; break;
00073                         }
00074                         break;
00075                 }
00076         }
00077 
00078         return ret;
00079 }
